title: An Act relative to the inclusion of commercial fishermen as a designated vocation for affordable and attainable housing preference in the town of Chatham under Section 32, Seasonal Communities, Subsection (d), of the Affordable Homes Act

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Luddy of Orleans and Senator Cyr, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4288) of Hadley Luddy (by vote of the town) relative to the inclusion of commercial fishermen as a designated vocation for affordable and attainable housing preference in the town of Chatham.  Housing.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Housing
Hearing scheduled for 11/10/2025 from 12:00 PM-12:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
